API 调用
实例：http://localhost:5000/dataclean?outlier=true&area=2&ppty=0&period=15
参数解释：
outlier: 是否使用离群点检测 并且剔除离群点（true false）

area：地区（1-49）
let cityDistrict = [
    [1, 16],//beijing
    [17, 31],//shanghai
    [32, 41],//guangzhou
    [42, 49]//shenzhen
];

ppty： 房屋类型（0-4）
let houseType = [
    [2, 4, 13, 15, 21],//residential building
    [3, 7],//villa
    [6, 12, 14, 16, 19, 20],//shop
    [18],//office building
    [5, 8, 9, 10, 11, 17]//apartment
]

period：数据时间间隔


返回结果实例：
{"data":[42000,42000,42000,42000,42000,44624,47248,49872,52496,46250,34500,60000,45855.69135802469,49250,50000,58433.333333333336,58433.333333333336,54717.16666666667,51001,51001,46937,50500,49190.187948350074,57250,49304.149159663866,49304.149159663866,49342.80482686254,49342.80482686254,49519.254601226996,42750,49674.750503018106,49674.750503018106,49881.15307150051,49881.15307150051,50012.36509528586,36800,50034.85841584158,50000,49848.05350194553,51700,50043.68252427185,43980,50210.30136986302,50210.30136986302,50186.034648700675,46350,50443.782524271846,47600,50034.88531029065,48393.02464788732,50455.12549019608,52950,52535.45132743363,62000,53933.503667481666,55609.5918367347,54697.401148482364,54667.3,54912.75845012366,55185.83870967742,55615.25707154742,55566.44776119403,56096.34900990099,54198.13114754098,56626.94681778553,46733.77777777778,56037.72727272727],"endTime":"2016-10-01T00:00:00.000Z"}
endTime:为最后一个不为零片段的时间
